content.question: Home remodeling services are provided in a perfectly competitive market but generate noise that angers neighbors. What is the socially optimal quantity of home remodeling services and the area that represents deadweight loss associated with the market equilibrium?

choices.label: <math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Q</mtext><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and area <math alttext="A C D" overflow="scroll"><mtext>ACD</mtext></math>
<math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Q</mtext><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and area <math alttext="A B C" overflow="scroll"><mtext>ABC</mtext></math>
<math alttext="Q sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Q</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and area <math alttext="A B C" overflow="scroll"><mtext>ABC</mtext></math>
<math alttext="Q sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Q</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and area <math alttext="A C D" overflow="scroll"><mtext>ACD</mtext></math>
<math alttext="Q sub 3" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Q</mtext><mn>3</mn></msub></math> and area <math alttext="C E F" overflow="scroll"><mtext>CEF</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>Q</mtext><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and area <math alttext="A B C" overflow="scroll"><mtext>ABC</mtext></math>

topic.text: 6.1: Socially Efficient and Inefficient Market Outcomes
